[docs]class ModApplicationError(Exception):
	""" Generic """



[docs]class WorldArgumentError(ModApplicationError):
	""" Raised when using the world API and an invalid
	argument is specified. 

	"""



[docs]class ModelArgumentError(ModApplicationError):
	""" Raised when a model function is used improperly.
	"""
